name: @rustyconover/nyiso-electricity-models
description: A collection of Tensorflow.js models for NYISO electricity demand, generation and pricing for use with microprediction.org.

scripts.deploy-lambda: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name electricity-bot --s3-bucket weather-lambdas --s3-key bot.zip --publish
scripts.build-lambda: zip -9 -r dist.zip lambda/ && aws s3 cp dist.zip s3://weather-lambdas/bot.zip
scripts.build: rm -rf dist lib lambda && webpack -c webpack.config.js

author: Rusty Conover <rusty@conover.me>
